main event: Several groups of triangular lights were observed moving north at approximately 100 mph over Fort Worth, Texas.
interesting points: The lights formed triangles with two green lights and one red light in each triangle,The lights were seen on a vertical plane approximately 1000 feet above ground,The observed lights emitted a sound similar to an outboard motor trolling,The sighting lasted approximately 5 minutes and involved multiple witnesses including a civilian couple and a National Guardsman, The lights did not blink and resembled those found on water towers or radio antennas.
witness description: A civilian couple and a National Guardsman
